long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I really like palettetab (http://palettab.com/) but since I use dark themes everywhere, it's a nasty flash of light at every ctrl-T.

This extension makes the ui dark, and makes the text dark when the background colour is too bright.

All credit for the original to Tim Holman & Claudio Guglieri
